nsure all of the Grove's defenders survive the first goblin assault)

A Bone To Pick: Overcome the skeletons in Moonrise prison during the assault. Absolute Devastation: Destroy Last Light. An Apple a Day Keeps the Scalpel Away: Defeat the Surgeon without being operated upon. Centennial Rivalries: Complete the Harper ambush. Devastation of the Absolute: Complete the assault on Moonrise. Familicide: Kill all members of the Thorm family. Know Thine Enemy: Defeat yourself in the Gauntlet of Shar's
